doc:
Robert Ridgely https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Ridgely 0 Robert Ridgely (December 24, 1931 – February 8, 1997) was an American actor and voice artist, known for both on-camera roles and extensive voice-over work. Robert_Ridgely ( December_24_,_1931 – February_8_,_1997 ) was an_American_actor_and_voice_artist , known for both_on-camera_roles and extensive_voice-over_work .
